    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_76197c2b30790bf414f7130a166c061ac3fb4e0d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_76197c2b30790bf414f7130a166c061ac3fb4e0d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elasticity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élasticité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elasticidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elasticità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαστικότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elasticidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the extension of a spring with force. When a spring is overstretched it is said to have reached its elastic limit (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Extension eines 
Frühlinges mit Kraft. Wenn ein Frühling overstretched, wird es
gesagt, seine elastische Grenze erreicht zu haben (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre l'extension d'un 
ressort avec la force. Quand un ressort est surétendu on dit 
qu'atteint sa limite d'élasticité (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a extensão de uma 
mola com força. Quando uma mola overstretched diz-se ter 
alcançado seu limite elástico (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra l'estensione di una
molla con forza. Quando una molla overstretched si dice per 
raggiungere il relativo limite di elasticità (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει την 
επέκταση ενός ελατηρίου με τη δύναμη. Όταν ένα ελατήριο 
είναι αυτό λέγεται για να έχει επιτευχθεί το ελαστικό όριό του
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la extensión de un 
resorte con la fuerza. Cuando se estira demasiado un resorte se 
dice para haber alcanzado su límite elástico (derecho).</string>
          </description>
        </general>
